title: Analyst Global Investment Services (SQL Reporting) at Robert Half Technology (Charlotte, NC)
text: Classification: Database Analyst Compensation: $60,000.00 to $95,000.00 per year We are currently looking for an Analyst/Associate director to join our Global Investment Services department here in Charlotte, NC. This individual will be responsible for building and maintaining research, trading and portfolio management applications. This is a permanent career opportunity and will pay a salary up to 95K depending on the candidates experience. We are looking for an individual who is accountable for understanding business needs and delivering technical solutions, with a strong emphasis on data and information systems. We are looking for someone with strong Database and TSQL experience on MS SQL Server 2008 and above. Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain internal research, trading and portfolio management applications and workflows - Use SQL Server Management Studio to construct queries, views, etc. to support data and reporting requests. - Work with investment professionals and business partners on their data and system needs - Support configurable applications (Screen Design, Calculation Definitions, Etc. ) - Build and deploy reports using Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) - Research/troubleshoot data/functionality issues related to reports, proprietary applications, and vendor packages - Investigate new data sources and coordinate their integration - Design solutions to improve processes and streamline repetitive tasks Required: - SQL Server - XML and XSLT - .NET Technologies - Visual Studio - C# Qualifications: - Previous experience supporting technical needs at an investment manager or similar financial firm highly desired. - Relevant experience in investments / information systems - General knowledge of fixed income and/or investment instruments - Experience building/using relational databases and writing advanced queries - Report writing/design experience (Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services, SSRS) - Proficiency with Microsoft Excel and VBA - Ability to excel in a fast-paced, project driven environment and meet tight deadlines
